## OptimisticStateSelector interface

Represents an object used to select what state is optimistic. Provided with the token [OPTIMISTIC\_STATE\_SELECTOR](./notification.optimistic_state_selector.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OptimisticStateSelector<TState> 
```

## Remarks

Optimistic state is reverted when errors occur in the requests.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [props](./notification.optimisticstateselector.props.md) | Prop&lt;TState&gt;\[\] | The props that should be included / excluded |
|  [strategy](./notification.optimisticstateselector.strategy.md) | "include" \| "exclude" | If set to 'exclude', all state except the props specified are treated optimistically. If set to 'include', only the props specified are treated optimistically. |
